SEARCH
Package net.i2p.router.web

Class PluginStarter

java.lang.Object
net.i2p.router.web.PluginStarter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PluginStopper
public class PluginStarter extends Object implements Runnable
Start/stop/delete plugins that are already installed Get properties of installed plugins Get or change settings in plugins.config
Since:
0.7.12
Author:
zzz

      Returns:
